Package oop

Class Mailbox

java.lang.Object
oop.Mailbox
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<Message>
Direct Known Subclasses:
EnhancedMailbox
public class Mailbox
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Message>
Represents a mail account and implements the user mailing operations.
Author:
Leandro F. Gomez Racca, Miriam Gertrudix Pedrola
